name: Galf Streem
overview: Galf Streem is an Action game, developed and published by XAIN, which was released in Japan in 1989. To start the game , you need to do as following : - start with disk B - insert disk A when you see a message - press on SPACE - then you come on a menu : option 1 = start game option 2 = create user disk - when you choose "start game", then you'll get 2 messages first message = insert user disk in drive A (then press on SPACE) second message = insert disk B in drive A (then press on SPACE) - in the game, access to the menu with the W key option 1 = data save option 2 = data load option 3 = use item option 4 = return to game
